content: do these trying times have you wishing you had a stress ball in hand how about a stress ball in the shape of a penis you are in the right place friend use this free crochet pattern to make your very own penis stress ball because i wanted this little guy to fit in the palm of my hand i made him about 4 5″ tall you could of course continue with the shaft for as many row as you like for added length if desired you could even add small black hairs for pubes
